summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of the new collapsible right panel feature with Code and Tweak tabs. All 10 test cases passed. Panel toggle, Code tab with snippets, Tweak tab with sliders, real-time animation updates, Reset button, and category switching all work correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: ESLint shows 103 errors but most are false positives for React Three Fiber JSX properties (position, args, rotation, intensity, etc.) - these are valid R3F syntax
Math.random() in useMemo is acceptable since it only runs once with dependency array
setActiveExample(0) in useEffect is valid pattern for resetting state on category change
context_for_next_testing_agent: New right panel feature added with Code and Tweak tabs. Panel starts closed by default. Use data-testid: panel-toggle, right-panel, tab-code, tab-tweak, control-{key} for sliders, reset-controls. Sliders update animation in real-time via ControlsContext. Each category has different controls and code snippets.

features_tested.panel_toggle_button: PASS - Opens and closes panel correctly
features_tested.panel_starts_closed: PASS - Panel is closed by default on page load
features_tested.code_tab_displays_snippet: PASS - Shows title, code block, and explanation for each animation
features_tested.tweak_tab_displays_sliders: PASS - Shows sliders with min/max guardrails for each category
features_tested.sliders_change_animation_realtime: PASS - Changing Color Hue from 180 to 280 changed tunnel rings from cyan to purple
features_tested.reset_to_defaults_button: PASS - Clicking reset returns all sliders to default values
features_tested.controls_change_on_category_switch: PASS - Tunnel shows 4 sliders, Velocity shows 3 different sliders
features_tested.code_snippets_change_on_category_switch: PASS - Tunnel shows 'Scroll-Driven Camera Movement', Velocity shows 'Velocity-Based Distortion'
features_tested.panel_toggle_position_updates: PASS - Toggle button moves with panel open/close state

all_6_categories_work_with_panel.tunnel: PASS - 4 sliders (Ring Count, Ring Spacing, Travel Speed, Color Hue)
all_6_categories_work_with_panel.velocity: PASS - 3 sliders (Distort Intensity, Base Animation, Velocity Effect)
all_6_categories_work_with_panel.shader: PASS - 3 sliders (Wave Frequency, Wave Height, Animation Speed)

test_details.test_1_open_panel: Clicked panel-toggle, verified right-panel has 'open' class
test_details.test_2_code_tab_content: Verified Code tab active by default, snippet title, code block, and explanation present
test_details.test_3_switch_to_tweak_tab: Clicked tab-tweak, verified Tweak tab becomes active
test_details.test_4_verify_sliders: Found all 4 Tunnel sliders with correct min/max values
test_details.test_5_change_slider_value: Changed Color Hue from 180 to 280, verified visual change (cyan to purple rings)
test_details.test_6_reset_to_defaults: Clicked reset-controls, verified Color Hue returned to 180
test_details.test_7_controls_change_on_category: Switched to Velocity, verified different sliders appear
test_details.test_9_close_panel: Clicked panel-toggle again, verified panel closes
test_details.test_10_all_categories: Tested all 6 categories have sliders and code snippets
